item.description: SHARE User Statistics Up-to-date information is on the official website. Registered Users Registered Users Publications Registered Users Publications Detailed Table

item.title: Publications
item.author: radim.bohacek@cerge-ei.cz (Radim Bohacek)
item.description: Publications A complete database of all research publications, books, chapters in books, policy papers, First Result Books, working papers, and other publications based on collected SHARE data can be found at https://share-eric.eu/. Publications of registered users Selected results in English Selected research results in English are available here. Newsletters Newsletters in Czech and English. If you published a work based on SHARE data, please inform the coordinator following this link.

item.title: Results
item.author: radim.bohacek@cerge-ei.cz (Radim Bohacek)
item.description: Selected Results and Presentations Selected research results and presentations in English are available here. Selected presentations of SHARE project in Czech are here. Newsletters in Czech and English. Presentations in Czech and English Language Lecture Older workers in the labor market: Lessons for a pension reform (2021) Filip Pertold (pdf) Lecture Multigenerational Educational Mobility in Europe (2022) Miroslava Federicova and Filip Pertold (pdf) Lecture Teachers Turnover (2022) Miroslava Federicova (pdf) Lecture Older workers in the labor market: Lessons for a pension reform (2021) Filip Pertold (pdf)

item.title: News
item.author: radim.bohacek@cerge-ei.cz (Radim Bohacek)
item.description: SHARE Newsletter **SHARE-ERIC publishes its biannual English newsletter that can be found here. ** The Czech newsletter is available here.
